attributes.action: petition to reinstate the speaker after this terrible scapegoating by MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the speaker has been used as a terrible scapegoat by mp's (mainly the lib dems and touries) because they cannot defend their own expenses claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
